member.summary: Event triggered when an order is placed via this client

member.name: E:Bittrex.Net.BittrexClient.OnOrderCanceled
member.summary: Event triggered when an order is cancelled via this client. Note that this does not trigger when using CancelAllOpenOrdersAsync

member.summary: The stop price will automatically adjust relative to the most extreme trade value seen.

member.summary: Unique ID of the order that was created by this conditional, if there is one

member.summary: Order to create if this conditional order is triggered

member.summary: Order or conditional order to cancel if this conditional order triggers
